unnormalised: Rental Agreements Got You Confused, Yaar? Don't Panic!
normalised: Rental Agreements Got You Confused, Friend? Don't Panic!

unnormalised: Mumbai's rental market, like a scene straight out of 'Gully Boy', is buzzing! Finding a place near Bandra or even Thane can feel impossible, right? But before you sign on the dotted line for that cozy 1BHK near IIT Bombay, make sure your rental agreement is solid.
normalised: Mumbai's rental market, like a scene straight out of 'Gully Boy', is buzzing! Finding a place near Bandra or even Thane can feel impossible, right? But before you sign on the dotted line for that cozy one B H K near I I T Bombay, make sure your rental agreement is solid.

unnormalised: Landlords are increasingly using online platforms now. Double-check those clauses! Things like maintenance charges (Rs. 2000/month is pretty standard these days), pet policies (especially if you have a furry friend!), and the lock-in period are crucial.
normalised: Landlords are increasingly using online platforms now. Double-check those clauses! Things like maintenance charges (rupees two thousand per month is pretty standard these days), pet policies (especially if you have a furry friend!), and the lock-in period are crucial.

unnormalised: Heard stories of disputes over security deposits (sometimes amounting to Rs. 50000+ for a decent flat!)? Get everything clearly mentioned. Also, remember to register the agreement! It might seem like a hassle, but it protects both you and the landlord. Talk to your local property lawyer – they know the drill! Happy hunting!
normalised: Heard stories of disputes over security deposits (sometimes amounting to rupees fifty thousand plus for a decent flat!)? Get everything clearly mentioned. Also, remember to register the agreement! It might seem like a hassle, but it protects both you and the landlord. Talk to your local property lawyer – they know the drill! Happy hunting!
